about_the_game:
Tale of Honor is a one of a kind game that turns the classic, turn based game of Chess into a Realtime Chess adventure.



Here you control single chess piece on boards of various sizes with an objective to reach destination, while the area is guarded by enemy chess pieces that move and attack in Real Time. So, the enemies will kill you the moment they spot you in their movement zone as per Chess rules, unlike turned based chess, they will not let you finish a move.




The game provides another dimension of strategy by allowing players to gather abilities and power ups to be used in unique ways to manipulate the board in their favor.





Unlock New Pieces and Build your Deck. As you progress through the game, you will unlock more pieces and would be able to collect them in your deck. You may have to sacrifice some pieces as u play, so be very careful about your choices.






The goal of the game is to infiltrate the kingdom of the Evil Lord and eliminate all bosses. This has to be done in a single run as a traditional roguelike. Every run would feel different as player will unlock different pieces, abilities and power ups and would end up with a different deck facing different sets of challenges.



Battle epic bosses that will make your journey challenging and more fun. Each area houses multiple mini-bosses and a main boss. All bosses have out of the board abilities that allow them to manipulate the board in the favor of the enemies, providing an extra dimension of challenge.




Apart from facing the enemies on the board, you'll also have to keep an eye on off board weapons that maybe shooting arrows or flames in your direction. Making timing your movements a key part of your gameplay. Thus apart from knowing where to move you'll also be looking at when to move.
detailed_description:
Tale of Honor is a one of a kind game that turns the classic, turn based game of Chess into a Realtime Chess adventure.



Here you control single chess piece on boards of various sizes with an objective to reach destination, while the area is guarded by enemy chess pieces that move and attack in Real Time. So, the enemies will kill you the moment they spot you in their movement zone as per Chess rules, unlike turned based chess, they will not let you finish a move.




The game provides another dimension of strategy by allowing players to gather abilities and power ups to be used in unique ways to manipulate the board in their favor.





Unlock New Pieces and Build your Deck. As you progress through the game, you will unlock more pieces and would be able to collect them in your deck. You may have to sacrifice some pieces as u play, so be very careful about your choices.






The goal of the game is to infiltrate the kingdom of the Evil Lord and eliminate all bosses. This has to be done in a single run as a traditional roguelike. Every run would feel different as player will unlock different pieces, abilities and power ups and would end up with a different deck facing different sets of challenges.



Battle epic bosses that will make your journey challenging and more fun. Each area houses multiple mini-bosses and a main boss. All bosses have out of the board abilities that allow them to manipulate the board in the favor of the enemies, providing an extra dimension of challenge.




Apart from facing the enemies on the board, you'll also have to keep an eye on off board weapons that maybe shooting arrows or flames in your direction. Making timing your movements a key part of your gameplay. Thus apart from knowing where to move you'll also be looking at when to move.
name: Tale of Honor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5 or Ryzen 5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon R9 380 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i7 or Ryzen 7 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Tale of Honor is a real-time, roguelike, deckbuilding chess adventure. Unlock new pieces, abilities and powerups through your unique runs & use them along with your wits to sneak through the evil armies, traps and bosses to capture the Evil King & restore honor back to the world.
